headline: Assurant (AIZ) Partners With Evident To Revolutionize Rental Equipment Risk Management
summary: Assurant (AIZ) has seen a 7% increase in its share price over the last quarter, with several important developments potentially contributing to this movement. The announcement of a partnership with Evident to enhance risk management within the commercial equipment rental industry likely played a role, aiming to provide seamless insurance verification and improved customer protection. Additionally, the company's launch of HOIVerify Origination, a solution designed to streamline insurance...

headline: Assurant Recognized on TIME’s World’s Best Companies 2025
summary: ATLANTA, September 10, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced it has been included for the third consecutive year in TIME’s World’s Best Companies 2025.

headline: Will WTW's Radar Deal With Sompo Transform Insurance Pricing?
summary: Willis Towers Watson partners with Sompo to deploy Radar, driving smarter pricing, client stickiness, and recurring revenues.
